title: From Scared to Sacred: Lessons in Learning to Dance with Life
description: What would you do if a spirit voice asked you to sit for an hour a day and take down its messages? Would you question your sanity? Would you write? Author Carol Woodliff shares beautiful poetic lessons from that spirit voice and honest personal essays reflecting on living that wisdom. It is a journey that is funny, touching, mystical and grounded in the question, "How do we live those spirit teachings and be compassionate with our human self at the same time?" Carol invites you to join her in this exploration and listen to the whispers within your own heart.
author: Carol Woodliff
